channel.title: I need help changing the requirements on weapons
channel.description:
Unfortunately the last time i used these forums.. I got annoyed by all the little kids that never shut up about spoon feeding and other crap... point being.. I don't care what you say, but if come into my topic to tell me how stupid i am or how easy it is to do... then GTFO instantly..
All I want to do is make rune weapons have lower requirements like 5 attack or something.. Dont ask why cause I really don't plan on telling you.. First things First.. Where would I go about finding the requirements anyways? in the Client.java? Clickingmost? Wearing? I've searched them all and didn't see exactly what im looking for.. anyhelp?

item.title: I need help changing the requirements on weapons

@chassy13 wrote:

Wearing class,

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40;

return 5;
